resume.name: NAYELI SOTOLONGO

responsibilities: Develop and maintain complex actuarial models for valuation and financial reporting using R and Prophet.
Perform quarterly experience studies on mortality and lapse rates to inform pricing assumptions for new product launches.
Streamline data extraction and manipulation processes by creating automated SQL queries, reducing manual reporting time by 15%.
Collaborate with the risk management team to perform sensitivity testing and stress scenarios for capital requirement assessments.
Supported senior consultants in the Property and Casualty practice with loss development and reserving analysis.
Cleaned and validated policyholder datasets using Python to ensure accuracy in predictive modeling.
Assisted in the preparation of annual rate filing documents for state regulatory agencies.
Conducted market research on industry trends and competitor pricing models to support client strategic planning.

skills: Proficient in R, SQL, and Python
